attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe all three members of the musical trio Rustic should be knighted for their services to music. They are a shining example of all that is good about our country and its culture.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
